meanings.definition: Of or relating to the time or period before recorded history.
meanings.sent1: The prehistorical artifacts were fascinating to study.
meanings.sent2: The researchers uncovered prehistorical remains in the ancient cave.
meanings.sent3: The prehistorical tools seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her prehistorical knowledge of the subject was unparalleled.
meanings.sent5: The prehistorical landscape painted a picture of a distant past.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring before history was recorded.
meanings.sent1: The prehistorical ruins stood as a testament to a forgotten era.
meanings.sent2: Legends of prehistorical creatures captured the imagination of many.
meanings.sent3: The prehistorical events seemed like scenes from a fantasy novel.
meanings.sent4: His prehistorical wisdom guided him through modern challenges.
meanings.sent5: The prehistorical mysteries whispered secrets of ancient times.
